item.title: Using Elasticsearch with .NET Aspire
item.description: This post shows how to use Elasticsearch in .NET Aspire. Elasticsearch is setup to use HTTPS with the dotnet developer certificates and and simple client can be implemented to query the data. Code: https://github.com/damienbod/keycloak-backchannel Setup Two services are setup to run in .NET Aspire. The first service is the official Elasticsearch docker container and deployed [â€¦] Link to article: https://damienbod.com/2024/09/16/using-elasticsearch-with-net-aspire/
